thread.title: Ralphs grocery store chain to recruit military vets and family members for 1,000 jobs
thread.title_full: Ralphs grocery store chain to recruit military vets and family members for 1,000 jobs - MarketWatch

author: Tonya Garcia
title: Ralphs grocery store chain to recruit military vets and family members for 1,000 jobs
text: Ralphs Grocery Company, a subsidiary of The Kroger Co. KR, +0.35% is planning to recruit military vets and their family members for about 1,000 open positions on Sept. 15. The jobs are available across the company's 209 stores. Kroger announced second-quarter earnings that beat estimates on Friday. With profits up 25%, the company raised guidance for the full year. Kroger is up 4.6% for the past three months. The S&P is down 6.8%.
